name: POLYBIUS (itch) (Goose and Honk)
description: 25 Years ago I found this in a old arcade in Oregon that was going out of Business of course, I haven't decided to dump it until now and I put it in a convenient emulation wrapper so others can enjoy it. Well less enjoy more or less. Being that the owner told me that a Government Organization gave it to him as a experiment on the mind anyway he was happy to get rid of it I mean I literally gave him 5 bucks and he rented a UHaul just to help me get it out of his arcade. Anyway here's the game i've never played it that whole Government thing really shook me also most people who played it went into comas and died or something anyway.
